title: How do i earn key fragments?
body: _Earn keys as rewards for winning any matchmade games or by purchasing them at the store for 125 RP. Keys unlock chests through Hextech Crafting_. I have won tons of matchmade games and haven't gotten a key :(

replies.body:

Even skins are a utter rip off, 10-25$ for a skin IS TOO DAMN MUCH. I could afford them but i don't feel like they are worth that much. What is so different with Hextech than say going to a casino ? It's basically the same thing since you're taking a gamble on the unknown. Might have to report this since Hextech is a form of gambling if you buy keys / chests from the store.

second of all if they are worse than blizz then why is there game still technically free to play? its up to the player if they want to have extra aesthetics added to their gaming experience. if you have problems saving ip for a champ then i dont think you play the game enough to talk this much shit about it.

you can get a key from any summoners rift queue as long as it is not a custom game. from my knowledge and experiences nothing drops them more often even getting S+ (i got like 4 S+ in a row and got no key fragments but i got 3 C's in a row and got 3 key fragments...)
kinda annoying but they just come with lots of playing i guess.
might also be a limit on how many you can get a week but riot hasn't shown it.
